2017-12-25|2017-12-31.description: Nyanko Sensei hasn’t been home in days, and Natsume is starting to get worried. He knows Sensei left in a party mood, but he has no idea where his friend and bodyguard was headed. And now there are rumors of evil spirits from the east heading to the local forest. Will Natsume have to face this threat all on his own?
2017-12-25|2017-12-31.name: Vol. 21

2017-12-25|2017-12-31.description:
“AGAINST THE INVISIBLE GOD”! The Ray quits the Justice League to return to his hometown of Vanity, only to discover that a new hero has taken his place as the city’s protector! To make matters worse, an ancient evil God has been unleashed upon Vanity…and the Ray himself is responsible!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverStephen Byrne1
VarVariant CoverDoug Mahnke & Wil Quintana2
2017-12-25|2017-12-31.name: The Light and the Warrior

2018-01-01|2018-01-07.description: As Madara uses his dominating power to fend off the Five Kage, Sasuke is reunited with his brother Itachi. They will have to unite in force when they confront Kabuto face-to-face. But with the defeat of Kabuto comes the time for the Edotensei warriors to return to the afterlife—Itachi along with them—leaving Sasuke to cope with losing his brother once again…
2018-01-01|2018-01-07.name: Hate Blade

2018-01-01|2018-01-07.description: Find out all about what DC has coming up in March 2018 with the January Previews Catalog! This month, DC’s Young Animal is back to bringing the weird, with all your favorite characters going in drastically new directions not even they could expect in CAVE CARSON HAS AN INTERSTELLAR EYE, MOTHER PANIC: GOTHAM A.D. and SHADE, THE CHANGING WOMAN and new series ETERNITY GIRL. Then, new DETECTIVE COMICS story “Batmen Eternal” begins, ACTION COMICS hits #999, new JUSTICE LEAGUE arc “Justice Lost” kicks off, the Female Furies come for Big Barda in MISTER MIRACLE, and more. The January Previews Catalog also includes the rest of the March 2018 on-sale comics, plus trade paperbacks and hardcovers, new items from DC Collectibles and more!

2018-01-08|2018-01-14.description:
The gang finally reaches the underground base, only to discover that their nightmare is just beginning. Plus, the fate of Scrappy-Doo—revealed at last! Plus, the daring adventures continue as Secret Squirrel goes where many men have gone before…!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverCarlos D'Anda1
VarVariant CoverPhilip Tan & Elmer Santos2
2018-01-08|2018-01-14.name: Malled!

2018-01-08|2018-01-14.description: The love of Black Adam's life has been delivered to the Lazarus Pit!
2018-01-08|2018-01-14.name: War Bonds Part 9

2018-01-15|2018-01-21.description:
Juleka has always suffered from the "class picture day curse." This year, Marinette has decided to help her break the curse. But she hadn't taken Chloe into account. Excluded from the picture, Juleka gets akumatized and turns into Reflekta, determined to do everything for people to notice her, for a change, and turning everyone in her image, including Cat Noir! There's only one superheroine left to save Paris: Ladybug!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverZAG Entertainment1
VarVariant CoverZAG Entertainment2

Note: The digital edition (1/10/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
2018-01-15|2018-01-21.name: Reflekta

2018-01-15|2018-01-21.description: Deadpool clashes with the X-Men in adventures that give new meaning to the word "classic"! First, a bromance is rekindled as Deadpool and Cable - the Merc with the Mouth and the Soldier with the Shoulders - face a fight for the future! Then, learn the secret shared history of the Regeneratin' Degenerate and the Ragin' Cajun as Wade and Gambit take on one last job together! Plus: The Forbush Man's murder sparks fears that someone is targeting Marvel's funniest characters for death. Deadpool must act before someone bumps off Squirrel Girl, Rocket Raccoon, Groot, Ant-Man, Howard the Duck and...the Punisher?! And Deadpool takes on Halloween and Christmas! Collecting DEADPOOL & CABLE: SPLIT SECOND #1-3, DEADPOOL VS. GAMBIT #1-5, DEADPOOL: TOO SOON? #1-4 and material from GWENPOOL SPECIAL #1 and GWENPOOL HOLIDAY SPECIAL: MERRY MIX-UP #1.
2018-01-15|2018-01-21.name: Volume 21: DvX

2018-01-22|2018-01-28.description: Mercy Graves has been Lex Luthor’s faithful assistant. She’s also been using up her eighth life as Catwoman finding new and more dangerous ways to take him down.
2018-01-22|2018-01-28.name: The Ninth Life

2018-01-22|2018-01-28.description:
"FIVE-FINGERED DISCOUNT," Part One

Up is down and black is white and the sex isn't happening—neither is the crime. WHAT IS THIS BOOK EVEN? After the heartbreaking, albeit totally unsurprising, finale of FOURGY!, our leads find themselves in the arms of others while the fate of the whole universe hangs in the balance...ish!

ARegular CoverChip Zdarsky1-2
BXXX Variant CoverKris Anka3
2018-01-22|2018-01-28.name: Five-Fingered Discount Part One: Spaces

2018-02-05|2018-02-11.description:
BROTHERHOOD Part 1

The BROTHERHOOD OF EVIL MUTANTS is back and more deadly than ever!

What is happening to RACHEL SUMMERS?

Plus: The GOLD team bids farewell to one of their own. Who will it be?

2018-02-12|2018-02-18.description:
POISON X PART 2

Continued from X-Men Blue Annual issue 1.

SYMBIOTE SPACE PIRATES! THE X-MEN and VENOM have been asking the wrong questions in the wrong seedy spaceport cantina! Vicious SPACE PIRATES are bad enough...but they're even worse when they're using ALIEN SYMBIOTES as weapons!

Note: The story continues in Venom issue 162.

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location

2018-02-26|2018-03-04.description: The fifth set of the Miyagi Prefecture qualifier round finals continues. With Tsukishima out of the game, Karasuno’s defense starts to fall apart. However, the team’s determined to keep it together. With both opponents physically and mentally exhausted, which one will prevail and move on to nationals?
2018-02-26|2018-03-04.name: A Battle of Concepts

2018-02-26|2018-03-04.description:
76 Action-Packed pages featuring Marvel’s ‘Big 3’ – Iron Man, Captain America and Thor!

Captain America Vs. the Red Skull! Their final battle!

Plus, Ironheart tries to help S.H.I.E.L.D., but do they want it? And Lady Octopus strikes!

Also, who has stolen the ruins of old Asgard? Odinson and Beta Ray Bill are going to find out!

By Nick Spencer, Andres Guinaldo, Javier Pina, Yildiray Çinar, Kevin Libranda, Jon Malin, Brian Michael Bendis, Stefano Caselli, Jason Aaron and Olivier Coipel!

Includes material reprinted from Captain America: Steve Rogers #15-16, Invincible Iron Man #8, and Unworthy Thor #2!

2018-03-05|2018-03-11.description:
Season Finale! "Warm Hearts on a Cold Day." In the end, will love conquer all? Find out as the Hero Cats go on one last adventure before taking a well deserved cat nap (but they'll be back). Ace, Cassie, Belle, Midnight, Rocket and Rocco bring it all home!

Note: The digital edition (2/28/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
2018-03-05|2018-03-11.name: Warm Hearts On A Cold Day; Aftermath On Skyworld

2018-03-05|2018-03-11.description: Booster Gold trains Blue Beetle, while over in Kahndaq, Wonder Woman trains Supergirl. Damian heads to Gorilla City to join Ra’s al Ghul and his allies, only to walk into the middle of Grodd’s rebellion against King Solovar.
2018-03-05|2018-03-11.name: Rapunzel

2018-03-05|2018-03-11.description:
76 pages of Mutant Mayhem!

The final chapter of 'Inhumans vs X-Men' is here! Can anyone win this conflict or are both sides doomed?! By Charles Soule and Leinil Francis Yu!

Featuring material first published in Extraordinary X-Men #19, Uncanny X-Men #18 and Inhumans vs X-Men #6.

2018-03-12|2018-03-18.description:
“Seas of Change” part two! The Justice League of China is on its own and restoring balance to the world one problem at a time. But when a fleet of North Korean warships arrives on their shores hunting down an emerging aquatic metahuman, Kong Kenan and his friends may be in over their heads—literally! The saga of the Aqua-Man of North Korea continues here!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location

volume.name: New Super-Man & the Justice League of China

2018-03-12|2018-03-18.description:
“Titans Apart” part two! Arsenal hits rock bottom when he is betrayed by his closest ally and left for dead, and to make matters worse, his oldest friends, the former Titans, don’t seem to trust him anymore. How far will Roy Harper go to discover the truth behind the conspiracy that no one else can see? And will the truth set him free…or will it destroy him?

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location

Finn and Jake are on a dungeon quest and Ricardo is back to find the love of his life!

Story Titles

  • Ricardio Arrythmia
  • Masters of Powerskull Sword

2018-03-26|2018-04-01.description:
After a series of attacks targeted toward women sweeps Burnside, Batgirl begins a thorough investigation to find the perpetrator. But she’s not the only one searching; Commissioner Gordon is on the hunt, too! Can this father-daughter duo put their differences aside long enough to crack the case? Find out in the team-up you’ve all been waiting for—trust us, you won’t want to miss it!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverDan Mora1
VarVariant CoverJoshua Middleton2
2018-03-26|2018-04-01.name: Father Knows Best

2018-04-02|2018-04-08.description:
In the aftermath of tragedy, the students of 3-E nevertheless march proudly in their graduation ceremony. Will their futures still unfold as planned? And what will they do with their reward money…? Then, enjoy a long side story revealing what Koro Sensei was really up to over winter break! Can Koro Sensei truly make a friend and ally out of anyone…?! Plus, a bonus short story with all-new characters, set in a dystopian future.

Chapter Titles

  • Class 178: Time for Tears
  • Class 179: Time Passes
  • Final Class: Time to Kill
  • Extra Class 1: Time to Come Home
  • Extra Class 2: Time To Go to the Izakaya
  • Extra Class 3: Time To Reveal Identities
  • Extra Class 4: Time To Say Thank You
  • Special One-Shot: Tokyo Department Store War Journal
2018-04-02|2018-04-08.name: Time To Say Thank You

2018-04-02|2018-04-08.description:
Senate executive, Shiina, has been turned into a demon by Enjin, descendant of the Hiizumi branch family. After failing to rescue their friend and comrade at Enoshima island, the gang regroups and readies to meet her again on land. This time, the plan is to lure Shiina to Sakurashin and attempt to tune her while an all-star lineup keeps her at bay. But just when it seems like they might save her, an unexpected development occurs! The fallen genius arc reaches its dramatic finale!

Contents

  • The Eastern Sea Circuit
  • Tomokazuki (Part One)
  • Tomokazuki (Part Two)
  • Tomokazuki (Part Three)
  • Tomokazuki (Epilogue)
  • Extra
2018-04-02|2018-04-08.name: Vol. 21

2018-04-02|2018-04-08.description:
In the DC Universe, Cyborg is the most technical advanced being on the planet—or so we thought. Introducing Mother Box 2.0: Robo-Dojo! Unlike Cyborg, these robots are piloted by the government’s best, brightest, and most loyal soldiers. Super Heroes just got a major upgrade produced, developed and financed by S.T.A.R. Labs.

VarVariant CoverCarlos D'Anda & Luis Guerrero2

2018-04-09|2018-04-15.description: The enemy of my enemy… is not my friend. But Kirk and Kor find themselves forced to work together against a common foe. Alliance, or a chance for deadly betrayal?
2018-04-09|2018-04-15.name: The Enemy of My Enemy; The Rhyme of the Ancient Mariner

2018-04-09|2018-04-15.description:
“Full Circle” part three! The Calculator has broken Blackbird and Fenice out of Arkham Asylum, putting targets on Batgirl’s and Huntress’s backs. And while our heroes are out of the picture, Calculator holds Gotham City hostage in exchange for Oracle’s identity. The team will have to risk setting a trap for Calculator—a dangerous move that could expose Barbara Gordon’s deepest secrets!

volume.name: Batgirl and the Birds of Prey

2018-04-09|2018-04-15.description:
Looking to make his mark on Gotham City’s crowded underworld, Red Hood infiltrates the Iceberg Lounge in an attempt to further annoy the Penguin. But it might be the Penguin who gets the drop on Red Hood this time. Plus, the truth about Bizarro’s condition finally comes out—and the consequences could be catastrophic for Artemis!

“MAN DOWN” part two! Deimos and his armies have besieged the Trinity—so why is Steve Trevor helping the enemy?! Wonder Woman, Batman and Superman fight their way through one monstrous magical menace after another as Dark Strike’s stolen Skartaran weaponry is unleashed!

The truth will set you free...or get everyone killed.

Find out what became of the Triceratons after the Invasion! Will they get along with their new neighbors or become the first victims of a new villain?

2018-04-23|2018-04-29.description:
“THE GOOD OLD DAYS” part three! London is lovely, and John’s having a fabulous time. And if you believe that, you’ll believe that the Huntress is on his side and the demons aren’t coming after his ex-girlfriend. Some people will believe anything.

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverTim Seeley & Chris Sotomayor1
Var80 Years of Superman Variant CoverSean Phillips2

2018-06-04|2018-06-10.description: Can anyone escape fate? That’s what Mac and her fellow newspaper delivery girls must discover as they break free from the year 2000 and travel to our distant future!

2018-06-11|2018-06-17.description: Kotoko has been a nurse for 2 months now, but keeps making mistakes at Tonan Hospital. There were no openings for nurses at the Kobe hospial where Naoki works. Feeling down, Kotoko gets cheered up by Chris, and tries her very best. Thanks to that, Ms. Hosoi tells her that she may now go and work at Kobe, and Kotoko is ecstatic! But at that moment, Naoki appears as a Trainee Practitioner at Tonan Hospital!
2018-06-11|2018-06-17.name: Vol. 21

2018-06-18|2018-06-24.description: Counterattacks by the Imperial Army have destroyed the force of the weakening Anti-Ares’ tanks. The terrorists, knowing they’ve already accomplished their goal, attempt to take their fate into their own hands, but cannot quell the appetite for revenge that’s consumed them—they want to break the Imperial citizens, to see them cry out and beg for forgiveness … but then, they hear a message from a certain Imperial soldier. Lieutenant Alice L. Malvin’s voice, heard by the people of the Nebulo nations through the cables, offered not an apology but asked three demands …
2018-06-18|2018-06-24.name: Vol. 21

2018-06-18|2018-06-24.description:
The mutiny begins!

While Iida and Perrier finally make their move to take over Tyrannos Japan from within, Ryouta and Himiko are in a tight spot on the island. In his dreamlike state, will Ryouta end up doing something truly unforgivable?! But before they know it, Kira's back on the scene, and he has his sights set on SAKAMOTO! Kira's stronger than ever before-how did a child become one of the most dangerous players in the game?!
2018-06-18|2018-06-24.name: Vol. 21

2018-06-18|2018-06-24.description:
The Champions vs. Alpha Flight? Ms. Marvel vs. Captain Marvel?

'Nuff said!

Saving the north just got a whole lot more complicated...

Plus...Nova no more?!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverStefano Caselli & Marcio Menyz1
2ndSecond Printing Variant CoverStefano Caselli & Marcio Menyz2
2018-06-18|2018-06-24.name: Northern Lights Conclusion

2018-06-18|2018-06-24.description:
Connaître son adversaire est une des lois de la guerre. Ils savent désormais de quel fer nous sommes forgés.

Lanawyn a promis à Lah’saa de trouver le moyen de changer les elfes Noirs Lea’yn et Feda’yn en elfes Rouges. Alors que le lien qui l’unit au crystal bleu semble de plus en plus distendu, elle et ses alliés doivent affronter mille périples afin que puisse renaître la dynastie Rouge. Mais dans l’ombre, certains se sont ligués et ont engagé la compagnie Noire pour les empêcher d’accomplir leur dessein.
2018-06-18|2018-06-24.name: Renaissance

2018-06-25|2018-07-01.description:
“Target: Batman” part two! When a hyper-crime crisis strikes Neo-Gotham, Batman flies in to save the day. But why is the local news bashing him for his heroic deeds? Stranger still, why are the very people Batman saved suddenly turning on him with anger and almost uncontrollable violence?

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverViktor Kalvachev1
VarVariant CoverDave Johnson2
2018-06-25|2018-07-01.name: Target: Batman Part Two

2018-06-25|2018-07-01.description:
"BROKEN, INSIDE" CONTINUES!

Doctor Aphra may be in Imperial prison, but she's certainly not alone. Rumors have it that these bars are haunted, but this rogue archaeologist knows there's something much more valuable going on. Meanwhile, Aphra's got information--information that the Rebellion wants. But how far are they willing to go--and who are they willing to recruit - in order to get it?

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverAshley Witter1
VarGalactic Icons Variant Cover (General Grievous - Separatist, #18/36)Rod Reis2
2018-06-25|2018-07-01.name: The Catastrophe Con Part II

2018-07-02|2018-07-08.description:
For months, an occult group called The Diogenes Initiative has been resurrecting heroes and letting them run amok in Ben Reilly's town. As the Scarlet Spider, he may have a thing or two to say about that.

IN THIS ISSUE: Ben gets one step closer to a miracle cure for young Abigail Mercury...

...and with it, one step closer to a fight to the death with his "brother" Kaine!

2018-07-09|2018-07-15.description: Kansai Fifth Technical High School is famous all over Osaka for its thugs. Here the weaklings get beaten into virtual slavery. In order to change his weak self, Matsushita joins the karate club...?!
2018-07-09|2018-07-15.name: Vol. 21

2018-07-09|2018-07-15.description:
WEIRD SCIENCE CONTINUES!

Is this the start of Annie Parker's own clone saga?

Can Peter and Mary Jane save her from herself?
2018-07-09|2018-07-15.name: Weird Science

2018-07-16|2018-07-22.description: Thorgal’s family is once again reunited, but the future is bleak. The hero is unconscious, dying, and his wife and children are exhausted and starving. Aaricia’s prayers bring her some hope: the goddess Frigg is willing to save Thorgal. However, her husband, Odin, is determined to get rid of the troublesome Child of the Stars once and for all. So begins one more challenge for Thorgal and his son Jolan – a chance to obtain what they’ve always dreamed off: a quiet, uneventful life…
2018-07-16|2018-07-22.name: The Sacrifice

2018-07-16|2018-07-22.description:
“The Falling,” Part 6. Bumblebee and Optimus Prime make a last, desperate bid to return to the real world as Shockwave teams up with the Autobots! Can Optimus stop what’s coming, or has he played right into the hands of the ultimate destroyer?

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover AKei Zama (a) & Josh Burcham (c)1
BCover BCasey W. Coller (a) & John-Paul Bove (c)2
RI1:10 Retailer Incentive CoverKei Zama3
2018-07-16|2018-07-22.name: The Falling Chapter 6: Unforgivable

2018-07-23|2018-07-29.description:
Something is coming. It cannot be stalled. It cannot be avoided. It cannot be reasoned with. As the end of everything draws near, a simple instruction rings out across the universe: prepare, confront, repel.

Some people are ready for the fight of their lives. Rodimus and the increasingly shambolic crew of the Lost Light…yeah, they’re really not. Like, at all.

2018-07-30|2018-08-05.description:
THE EXPLOSIVE CONCLUSION OF "TEAM WEAPON X"!

What began as a team of circumstance reaches its only logical conclusion: A GRAVE!

Warpath and Old Man Logan aren't long for this world, but will Sabretooth rally the rest of the team or sign their epitaph himself?
2018-07-30|2018-08-05.name: If He Dies, He Dies Conclusion

2018-08-06|2018-08-12.description: After trying to take Shoko's life, Toda comes back to the realm of sanity with the help of Sawako! With their bond as husband and wife restored. As the situation converges, Kaneyama comes to his senses! What will Shoko's fate be in this runaway madness?! And...Shoko's side of the story....?! The raging climax! Super erotic suspense!
2018-08-06|2018-08-12.name: Rinse

2018-08-06|2018-08-12.description:
Season 4 issue #4

After losing his day job as an office clerk, Lucas Barrett decides to become a full-time superhero in hopes of making a career out of it. In efforts to impress potential employers like EquilIbrium and PACT, the Human-Lizard investigates the source behind Toronto's monster activity only to find a connection with Walmer Plus. What is Walmer Plus? They're the pharmaceutical company that gifted Lucas with regenerative powers after an experimental drug testing. Thankfully, our hero has an inside man in Jerry, a lab tech who will assist the Human-Lizard in being a bonafide superhero!

Note: The digital edition (8/8/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.

Mourning the loss of the Kryptonians wiped out by Rogol Zaar, Supergirl decides to play detective and sets off into deep space to learn more about the would-be usurper. Using whatever tech she can scrounge, Supergirl builds a star cruiser, and after intel from Green Lantern, she blasts off into the cosmos with Rogol Zaar’s deadly axe to solve the mystery—along with a traveling companion you won’t believe!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverTerry Dodson & Rachel Dodson1
VarVariant CoverAmanda Conner & Paul Mounts2
VarBlank Variant CoverNone3
2018-08-06|2018-08-12.name: The Killers of Krypton Part One

2018-08-06|2018-08-12.description:
The extra large 46 page penultimate issue of 100% Biodegradable kicks off in style with an explosive self contained 16 page 'Funguys' adventure by the legendary Ian Edginton (X-Force, 2000ad, Aliens) and Alan Burrows (Eagle, Red Dwarf).

Also inside this issue:

A young cyborg seeks bloody vengeance for the death of his parents in Mark Bertolini and Gary O' Donnell's 'With A Vengeance'.

A group of unwary space scavengers find themselves trapped in the midst of a battle between two superior intellects in 'Catch' by Mikael Lopez and N G Williams.

The return of an old adversary spells trouble for the crew of Skow 709 in 'Skowdogs' by John Freeman (Dr Who, Judge Dredd Megazine), David Hailwood, Dave Thomson and Ken Reynolds.

A hapless photographer puts his soul on the line to get the perfect shot in 'Photo Op' by Steven Fraser and Edward R. Norden.

A gigantic 50 foot tall lizard has a bad day at the supermarket in 'Supermarket Monster' by Ben Peter Johnson (Viz, Hallowscream).

All this, and more!

2018-08-13|2018-08-19.description:
Force Six, The Annihilators 21 Shade of Sight

The final fight and flames of a dying fire as Kojin Ahsaguri faces off against a powerful pugilist. What has the assassin learned and what lesson will Kojin need to teach in order to survive the burning gaze of his ultimate adversary? Force Six season II comes to a close in this 21st episode. Singed scenes and sentences by Drew Spence.
2018-08-13|2018-08-19.name: Shade of Sight

2018-08-20|2018-08-26.description:
Next up on the Teen Titans’ target list is none other than longtime antagonist Gizmo, whose neighborhood toy store secretly serves as a front for his arms-dealing business. (You can get a Nerf blaster and a rail gun? Cool!) But this whole escapade is about to blow up in their faces when they find Gizmo strapped to an atomic bomb that’s about to go off—right in the middle of New York City. And it’s rush hour to boot? Nice knowing you, Big Apple!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverBernard Chang & Wil Quintana1
VarVariant CoverAlex Garner2
2018-08-20|2018-08-26.name: Full-Tilt Boogie!

volume.name: Tatsujinden - 9 Banri o Kaze ni Nori

2018-09-10|2018-09-16.description:
"FORTRESS VADER," PART 3

DARTH VADER returns to the place of his birth as he seeks the path to his destiny.

Echoes from the past reach out to him - both from his own, and from the dark history of the SITH.

2018-09-24|2018-09-30.description:
It’s the final battle against the forces of Sandak, the usurper of Skath’s castle! Lera’s secret is revealed to Sonja! Can the warrior Skath find redemption? Will the dark power of Kulan Gath’s amulet influence our heroes? And how does Sonja best a SHARK? Find out in the last chapter of THE BLADE OF SKATH!

2018-10-01|2018-10-07.description: Thanks to the valiant efforts of Kawakubo in London, BECK lands a contract with the U.K.’s biggest indie label, Naff Records! Now with a some must-needed backing in the way of recording fees, the guys can finally get to work on their long-awaited full album! It’s do or die, and BECK’s going to have to fight for their lives if they have any hope of reaching their next big stage and paying back everything they owe in full!
2018-10-01|2018-10-07.name: Volume 21

2018-10-01|2018-10-07.description:
AJ Styles-The Phenomenal One-is a WWE Superstar who traveled the world to make his name, and then confirmed to the WWE Universe just how amazing he was in record time. Follow his round-the-world journey into the spotlight here!

2018-10-08|2018-10-14.description:
Stories of Camelot have been told on earth for ages. The Legend of King Arthur and Excalibur had long been considered nothing more than a fairy tale by most historians. But Camelot was once a real place and now the tales behind the legend will finally be revealed...and the truth of its history is much more a nightmare than a fairy tale.
